content.rendered:
Michael Pinfold has been a key member of Regent College’s team for the past 3 years and left the organisation at the end of December 2016.
We take this opportunity to wish Michael well in all future endeavours and inform students that all curriculum related queries should be directed to the Director of Studies, Sunita Kotta, and welfare issues to their respective Cohort Leaders.
